name: lunatic pistol
description: A standard issue LDC pistol with burst-fire capability.  This belongs to an intermediate tier between old human weapons adapted with Lunarian technology and Lunarian tech proper weaponized, as noted by the very wide trumpet-like muzzle and (artificial) bunny ears on top of it.  For that reason, it's mostly incompatible with human tools and modifications.  It's powered by the spiritual energy of the user.
//2: Recharge time should be full from empty every 30 s. However, recharge time is automatic and there's a bug making artifacts recharge at twice the speed, so total recharge time is set at 120 s ingame

name: lunar service rifle
description: A standard issue bolt-action LDC rifle with an integrated bayonet.  The design is based on an old human weapon, fabricated by and upgraded with Lunarian technology.  For that reason, it's mostly compatible with human tools and modifications.  It's powered by the spiritual energy of the user.
//: The SSiB training rifle is either based on a Mosin or the Japanese Type 89 that used 'type 38 chamber in 7.62×38mmR tracer' according to some post on Reddit. However, Type 89 doesn't seem to exist, only the Type 38 (6.5×50mm Arisaka) or 99 (7.7×58mm Arisaka), which is the one I'll use as basis
//2: Recharge time should be full from empty every 30 s. However, recharge time is automatic and there's a bug making artifacts recharge at twice the speed, so total recharge time is set at 120 s ingame
